name: secret-key
effect: Used by trainer in the Galactic Eterna Building, on the ground floor, to the left of the TV : Unlocks the secret rotom room, in which there are five appliances which can change Rotom’s form.
short_effect: Gen IV: The key to Rotom’s appliance room. Gen III: The key to Cinnabar Gym.

flavor_text.platinum: A high-tech key that has to be used at a specific location. It emits a special electric signal to open a door.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A high-tech key that has to be used at a specific location. It emits a special electric signal to open a door.
